project.description:
Generate the documentation of distro independent ROS tools and REPs.
Generated from buildfarm/resources/static_jobs. Do not edit on Jenkins but in the repository.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
REPOS="https://github.com/ros-infrastructure/catkin_pkg.git https://github.com/ros-infrastructure/jenkins_tools.git https://github.com/ros-infrastructure/rep.git https://github.com/ros-infrastructure/rosdep.git https://github.com/ros-infrastructure/rosdistro.git https://github.com/ros-infrastructure/rospkg.git https://github.com/vcstools/rosinstall.git https://github.com/vcstools/vcstools.git"
DOC_DIR="$WORKSPACE/documentation_gen"
rm -rf $DOC_DIR mkdir $DOC_DIR cd $DOC_DIR
for r in $REPOS do git clone $r done
DIRS="`find . -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d -exec basename '{}' \;`" export PYTHONPATH=""
for d in $DIRS do export PYTHONPATH=$DOC_DIR/$d/src:$PYTHONPATH done
echo "PTYHON PATH IS: $PYTHONPATH"
for d in $DIRS do echo "DOCUMENTING $d" cd $d/doc make upload cd ../../ echo "--------------------------------" done
rm -rf $DOC_DIR
